title: The Nightmare
desc:
Post 2359
- After four rounds of not having the status, players gain the **Dream** status. (Card 74) While you have this Identity.
- Playing a <:clocks:1171222463200379021> card wakes the player of that card up while you have this ID.
- Every 3 turns, **Destroy** a **Dream**ing player. They come back to life if you lose this ID.
- If all other players are dead, lose this ID.
